trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There was one other sighting in Fort Worth on or around November 28th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsComing home and saw low in the southwest sky two very bright star like objects. They were vertically in line with each other. The one on the bottom was extremely larger and brighter than the one just above it. Took my husband outside and he saw them also. Went back out about 10 minutes later and they were gone. Does anyone know if one or both were planets maybe. Had a feeling that they weren't. Pretty cool!
Summary: Two very bright star like objects.
